source: Great! Jomo gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less warlord on this island!
target: Hunnert! Jomo hett upgeven as he siene lesten Husen ofbrannen sach. Dat is een Kummandant minner up de Insel!

source: Still, I saw no way that I could erase my shame without fighting against these Barbarians. So, I left Fremil by boat to find a new world and a new life for myself, somewhere in the south. Now I am sailing on the Gulf of Perl with my family, some of my friends and a few of my best warriors.
target: Ick wuss nich, wo ick mien Schann ohne eene Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü liekmaken kann. Also hebb ick Freemilt up eenem Schipp verlaten, um eene neie Heimaad un een neies Leven to finnen, enerwaar im Süden. Upstünds seil ick in de Parrelsbucht mit mien Familie, enigen Frünnen un een paar vun mienen besten Soldaten.

source: We landed on an unknown coast and found peaceful rest under the palm trees growing at the shore. But that is about as good as it gets. The truth is: when I woke up this morning, I saw nothing but sand around us.
target: Wi sünd up eener frömden Küst lannt un kunnen uns unner de Palmen an de Waterkant hagelk verhalen. 't is as 't is, man nich as 't wesen mutt. De Wahrheid is: as ick vunmörgens upwaakde, hebb ick nix as Sand sehn.

source: Sire, I saw that the construction of the blockhouse was completed, so I have assigned one of my best soldiers to it to keep watch on the desert.
target: Mienheer, ick hebb sehn, dat de Wachters-Kamerke nu beschickt is. Ick hebb eenen vun mienen besten Soldaten schickt, över de Wüüst to wachten.

source: At first, I was naive and hoped that they were peaceful, but as soon as one of them saw me, they charged towards me and started attacking me with their throwing spears. Thanks be to the Gods that I was able to flee and hide myself, before retreating back to our colony under cover of darkness.
target: Vörderhand was ick so eenfoldig, to glöven, se wesen villicht freedsam, aber as eener vun hör mi sehn hett, sünd se all to mi henlöpptun hebben Speren na mi smeten. De Gotten Loff un Dank dat ick flüchten un mi versteken kunn, ehr ick im Dunkeln torügg in uns Dörp gahn kunn.

source: In every military building, you can set the preference for heroes (trained soldiers) or rookies. From time to time, a soldier will walk out of the building and be replaced by a stronger/weaker one automatically – this is what you saw earlier.
target: För elkeen Soldateree-Boo kannst du fastleggen, of Helden (utbildt Suldaten) oder Snöttbaarten vörtrucken worden. Of un an verlaat een Soldat dat Huus un word automatisk mit eenem starkeren/swackeren utwesselt – dat hest du vörhen sehn.

source: Other ways to produce food – different kinds of food – are fishers and farms. The wheat of the farms has to be processed with water in a bakery before it becomes edible. You can obtain water by building a well on a spot where your geologists have found a water source.
target: Annere Wege, Spiesen – annere Aarden vun Spiesen – to produzeren, sünd Fiskers un Buurdereen. De Weit vun Buurdereen mutt mit Water in eener Backeree verarbeidt worden, ehr man 't eten kann. Du kriggst Water, indeem du eene Well an eener Stee baust, waar een Schattsöker Water funnen hett.

source: You’ve lead the expedition to a successful end and founded a new colony. I’ve sent out some geologists – they already report that they’ve found some iron ore.
target: Du hest de Söök good klaarmaakt un een neies Dörp gründt. Ick hebb eenen Schattsöker schickt – he hett al Iesenkluut funnen.

source: An expedition ship reached a coast and is waiting for further commands.
target: Een Schiüü up Söke hett een Küst funnen un wacht för dien Gebodd.

source: Center view on this
target: Hierher springen

source: Center the main view on this
target: Hierher springen

source: Food is very important for mines and military training areas. Establish a well working food environment by building at least one farm, one blackroot farm and a mill. The two kinds of flour together with water from a well will be baked into bread in a bakery, so build a bakery and a well, too.
target: Spiesen sünd leep wichtig för Bargwarken un Övens-Boen för Soldaten. Bau eene gode Versörgung mit Spiesen up, indeem du tominnst eene Buurderee, eene Swartwuddel-Buurderee un eene Möhlen baust. De twee Aarden vun Mehl worden mit Water ut eener Well in eener Backeree to Brood backen, bau also ok eene Backeree un eene Well.

source: In this scenario, I’m going to tell you about soldiers, their training and their profession: warfare. Although Widelands is about building up, not burning down, there is an enemy you sometimes have to defeat. Yet warfare is mainly focused on economics, not on military strategies, and its mechanics deserve explanation.
target: In düsse Inföhren verklaar ick di Soldaten, hör Utbildung un hör Beruf: Krieg. In Widelands gaht  't um Upbauen, nich Ofbrannen, aber of un an mutt du eenen Feind manntjen. Bi'm Krieg gaht 't in 't Geheel um de Wirtschaft, nich taktiske Dingen, aber Slachten mutten  doch verklaart worden.

source: Your soldiers will leave the fortress while the construction is going on. This means that your fortress will lose its military influence, as I described above.
target: Diene Soldaten verlaten de Schanz as 't utbaut word. Diene Schanz schütt unnertüsken dat Land nich mehr, as ick al beschreven hebb.

source: Build military sites to expand your territory
target: Bau Soldateree-Boen, um dien Gewest to vergrotern

source: If you’re low on soldiers to occupy new military sites, use the downward arrow button to decrease the capacity. You can also click on a soldier to send him away.
target: Wenn du nich genoog Soldaten hest, um neie Soldateree-Boen to besetten, kannst du de Tahl vun Soldaten mit de Piel-runner-Knoop minnern. Du kannst ok eenen Soldat anklicken, um hüm wegtostüren.

source: I hope I could teach you how you can control the economy in Widelands. There are many options and they can be confusing at first. Even if you’ve only understood a few concepts, you mustn’t give up. Try them out in some games, become familiar with them and experience the possibilities. Then, return to this tutorial and learn the rest!
target: Ich hoop, dat ick di lehren kunn, wo du de Wirtschaft in Widelands kuntrolleren kannst. 't gifft mennig Instellungen un se könen toeerst elkeen rammdösig maken. Ok wenn du eerst een paar daarvun verstahn hest, düsrt du nich upgeven. Versöök 't all in een paar Spelen, um 't to kennen to kriegen, un probeer de Kansen ut. Dann koom torügg to düsse Inföhren un lehr de Rest!

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi düsse Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s hut can’t find any game in his work area. Remember that you can build a gamekeeper’s hut to release more game into the wild.
target: De Jäger, de bi düsse Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen. Du kannst neie Deerten tüchten, wenn du een Deertentüchteree baust.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi düsse Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi düsse Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: Save Game Error!
target: Fehler bi'm sekern!

source: You may of course enhance all mines to deep mines instantly given you have the workers – bigger mines work a bit faster, smaller mines need cheaper food. It’s up to you which strategy you prefer.
target: Natürelk kannst du all Bargwarken stracks utbauen, wenn du de nödigen Arbeiders hest – deepe Bargwarken arbeiden en bietje gauer, lütte Bargwarken bruuken billigers Eten. Du maakst of, wat di lever is.

source: We need to build a tavern for preparing rations. To get the raw food, we have to build a fisher’s house, and as nobody likes raw fish, a smokery to smoke it. Furthermore, build a berry farm which will plant berry bushes, and a fruit collector’s house so the bushes will be harvested.
target: Wi bruken eene Kneipe, um Happen torechttomaken. Um dat ruge Eten to kriegen bruken wi eene Fiskeree, un wiel nüms rugen Fiss mag, eene Rökelkamer, um 't to rökeln. Bau ok eene Buskenplanteree, de Busken för Früchten anplant, un eene Früchtenpottjeree, um de Busken to arnten.

source: The warrior’s ax is the most dangerous of all Barbarian weapons. Only a few soldiers ever were able to handle this huge and powerful ax. It is produced in a war mill and used – together with food – in a training camp to train soldiers from attack level 4 to level 5.
target: De Ridderext is de machtigste Wapen vun allen, de de Willen Lüü hebben. Bedröövt minn Soldaten könen düsse grote, baldadige Ext bruken. 't word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert un – tosammen mit Spiese – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 4 up Stand 5 to verbetern.

source: Most buildings will only produce something when the stock level in your warehouses falls below the target quantity, so you should indicate the reserve you want to stockpile.
target: De meesten Husen produzeren blot dann wat, wenn diene Kraamhusen minner Waren hebben, as de End-Tahl fastleggt. Du kannst so also fastsetten, wo völe Waren du överhollen willt.

source: No Level Ground
target: Hebb keen Klei mehr

source: The clay digger working at this clay pit can’t find any level ground in his work area. Consider dismantling this clay pit and rebuilding it somewhere else.
target: De Lehmgraver dat warkt bi düsse Lehmkuhl hett keen Klei tum utbuddeln. Überlegg di, of du dat Huus plattrieten oder ofbrannen un annerwegens wedde hensetten willt.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more coal.
target: Düsses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Köhle finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more gold ore.
target: Düsses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Goldkluut finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more granite.
target: Düsses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Flint finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more iron ore.
target: Düsses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Iesenkluut finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more coal.
target: Düsses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Köhle finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more gold ore.
target: Düsses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Goldkluut finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more iron ore.
target: Düsses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Iesenkluut finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more granite.
target: Düsses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Flint finnen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the rock mine can produce two blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert düsses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Blocken Flint.

source: When roads are under heavy load for a long time, one carrier is usually not enough to transport goods swiftly. Traffic jams are the consequence. Such roads therefore employ a second carrier: an ox that helps to carry the wares. This doubles the transport capacity.
target: Wenn Straten lange starken Verkehr hebben, is een Lastendrager mennigtied nich genoog, um Waren fix to transporteren. Da gahn Staus na. Sülke Straten kriegen daarum eenen tweeden Lastendrager: een Oss helpt, Waren to dragen. Dat verdübbelt de Kansen tum Transport.

source: Clear Road Network
target: Stratennett uprümen

source: Resolve the chaotic road network by clearing all unnecessary roads.
target: Rüüm düsses Kuddelmuddel vun eenem Stratennett up, indeem du all unnützen Straten wegdoost.

source: Expanding would also provide more space for farming. We could use some extra barley to recruit more reindeer, as our roads are quite busy.
target: Uns' Gewest to vergrotern gifft uns ok mehr Rüümte för Ackerland. Wi könen een bietje Garste bovendeem bruken, um mehr Sneeihirsken antohüren; uns' Straten sünd hennig besig.

source: When soldiers train to use new weapons, their old equipment is discarded. Take into account that the useless scraps will clutter up your roads until they are stored in a warehouse somewhere.
target: Wenn Soldaten bi'm Öven neie Wapen kriegen, word de olle Utrüstung wegsmeten. Vergeet nich, dat de unnützen Överblievsels diene Straten verstoppen, bit se in een of anner Kraamhuus unnerbrocht sünd.

source: That won’t do yet. I still need to connect the lumberjack’s hut to the rest of my road network. After ordering the construction site, I was automatically put into road building mode, so all I have to do is click on the blue flag in front of my headquarters.
target: Dat langt noch nich. Ick mutt dat Boomhauer-Huus eerst mit de Stratennett verbinnen. Nadeem ick de Baustee anörnt hebb, bün ick automatisk klaar tum Stratenbau. Ick mutt also blot de blaue Fahn vor mienem Raadhuus anklicken.

source: The shorter your road segments are, the faster your wares will be transported. You should therefore make sure that your roads have as many flags as possible.
target: So körter diene Straten-Delen sünd, so fixer worden diene Waren transporteert. Daarum sallst du so völe Fahnen as mögelk up diene Straten stellen.

source: The minimap shows the complete map in miniature. You can directly jump to any field by left-clicking on it. You can also toggle buildings, roads, flags and player indicators on and off inside the minimap.
target: De Lütte Kaart wiest de kumplete Kaart in Lütt. Du kannst stracks to eenem Feld springen, indeem du mit de linke Muustaste daarup klickst. Du kannst ok Wieser för Husen, Straten, Fahnen un Spelers in de Lütt Kaart an- un utknipsen.

source: the road building symbol.
target: dat Stratenbau-Teken utköörst.

source: Excellent! To enter road building mode for any flag, left-click on a flag and select
target: Hunnert! Du kannst mit de Straten-Bauen vun elkeen Fahn anfangen, indeem du eene Fahn mit de linken Muustaste anklickst un

source: Keep the slopes in mind while placing roads and use them to your advantage. Also, try to keep roads as short as possible and always remember to place as many flags as you can on road segments to share the load better.
target: Denk an de Schüünten wenn du Straten baust un bruuk se tu dienem Vördeel. Maak de Straten immer so kört un stell so völe Fahnen up as mögelk, daarmit de Last good verdeelt word.

source: Build a second quarry near the rocks and connect it to your road network.
target: Bau noch een Flintslagerhuus dicht bi de Stenen un verbinn 't mit dienen Straten.

source: The shipyard is a medium building. Although it can be built everywhere on the map, the shipwright only works when he is close to the water and there are no trees or roads at the shoreline.
target: De Warft is een middelmatigs Huus. Se kann up de ganze Kaart baut worden, aber de Schippebauer warkt blot dann, wenn Water in de Naberskupp is un de Küst nich vun Bomen oder Straten verdeckt word.

source: The stock menu window has four tabs. The first (and currently selected) one shows you all your current wares, including those on roads, at flags and inside buildings waiting for processing.
target: Dat Bestand-Fenster hett veer Listenwesslers. De eerste (de jüüst utköört is) wiest all Waren de du hest, ok de, de up Straten un Fahnen sünd oder in Husen wachten, bit se bruukt worden.

source: The second tab shows you all your workers, again those on roads and in buildings summed up.
target: De twede Listenwessler wiest all de Arbeiders, weer all up Straten un in Husen tosammen.

source: Split your roads into shorter sections by planting some flags. This will speed up transportation of your wares.
target: Deel diene Straten in körte Delen up, indeem du Fahnen baust. Dann worden diene Waren gauer transporteert.

source: An economy consists of all buildings and flags connected by roads. The supplies and demands of buildings are handled in its economy.
target: Eene Wirtschaft umfaat all Husen un Fahnen, de mit Straten verbunnen sünd. De Versörgung vun elkeen Huus word vun siener Wirtschaft regelt.

source: Some buildings, such as the farm, have a very small work area. If the building is surrounded with trees or roads, production will stop.
target: Enige Husen, to 'n Bispööl de Buurderee, hebben een bannig lüttes Arbeidsgewest. Wenn dat Huus mit Bomen oder Straten dichtmüürt is, kann 't nich mehr arbeiden.

source: When a building is destroyed, its workers will start looking for a nearby flag from which they can move by road to a connected warehouse. If there are no such flags in the vicinity, they will keep wandering around and eventually die.
target: Wenn een Huus ofrieten word, söken de Arbeiders na eener Fahn, vun waar se över Straten to een Kraamhuus komen könen. Wenn keene sülke Fahn in de Naberskupp is, wannern se sünner Stüür rum bit se starven.

source: First, you will have to open the statistics menu (you can find the corresponding button at the bottom). We will need this menu several times.
target: Toeerst muttst du dat Tahlen-Menü opmaken (de Knoop daarför is am unnern Rand). Wi bruken düsses Menü mennig Tied.

source: Open it. You can access it from the statistics menu.
target: Maak 't up. Dat kannst du vum Tahlen-Menü doon.

source: The statistics menu is accessed via the second button at the bottom. It provides several windows that give you information about the game.
target: Dat Tahlen-Menü kannst du mit de tweden Knoop am unnern Rand opmaken. 't hett eenige Knopen, de di Informationen över dat Speel geven.

source: But a war is expensive, and not always the path leading to the goal. When setting up a new game, you can also choose peaceful win conditions. You should definitely try them out, they’re worth it.
target: Aber Kriege sünd düür, un Slachten sünd nich immer de Weg tum Enn. Wenn du een neies Speel begünnst, kannst du ok friedelke Upgaven tum Winnen utkören. Du sallst se absolut versöken, se sünd beter as Oorlog.

source: Unable to determine valid win conditions because the map '%s' could not be loaded.
target: Kunn de Kaart »%s« nich laden un daarum mögelk Upgaven tum WInnen nich utfinnen.

source: We do not train soldiers to evade attacks; a true warrior can block his opponent’s blows with a skillful twist of the sword instead of jumping away like a coward.
target: Wi lehren uns' Soldaten nich, Angriffen uttowieken; een echter Soldat kann de Slagen vun sienem Tegenpart mit sienem Sweert mooi upfangen, in Stee, dat he as een Bangbüx herumhüppkt.

source: Excellent. Do you remember how to close windows? You simply have to right-click on them. This will work with all windows except for story message windows like this one. Go ahead and try it.
target: Hunnert. Weetst du noch, wo dat Sluten vun Fensters gaht? Du mutt se blot mit de rechte Muustast anklicken. Dat gaht för all Fensters buten Vertellsel-Fensters as düsses hier. Versöök 't.

source: Like all other tribes, the Atlanteans are also able to train soldiers: the dungeon trains attack – the major attribute of the Atlanteans – and the labyrinth trains evasion, health and defense. The items produced by the industry are used to train better soldiers in the two training sites.
target: As all Völker könen de Atlantinger hör Soldaten utbilden: Gefahrelke Gangen lehren Angriff – daar sünd se baldadig in – un Dwaalwegen lehren Utwieken, Gesundheid un Verteidigung. De twee Övens-Boen bruken tum Lehren vun Soldaten de Waren, de vun de Metall-Wirtschaft produzeert worden.

source: Three weeks later, I returned to Fremil to speak with our king. He was furious at the Barbarians, yet forbade any attack on these tribes. He believed that our army was too weak to survive in a war against the Barbarians.
target: Dree Weken naher was ick torügg in Freemilt, um mit de König to spreken. He was güünsk över de Willen Lüü, versee mir aber, düsse Völker antogriepen. He meende, uns Soldateree is to swack, düsse Willen Lüü im Krieg to manntjen.

source: Build a fortress on the peninsula (near where the Barbarian headquarters stood before). Finally, this will avoid new settlements of other tribes in that region.
target: Bau eene Schanz up de Uthamm (waar vördeem dat Wille Raadhuus stunn). Dann laten sük keene annern Völker in düsse Gegend daal.

source: Today, as I walked down to the eastern shore, I got a shock. I caught sight of one of those hated, evil, Barbarian tribes with whom we have had so many problems before.
target: As ick vörhen to de oostelken Küst gahn bün, hebb ick mi verschrickt. Ick hebb eenes vun düssen furchtbaren, öveln, Willen Völkern sehn, waar wi al so mennig Problemen mit harren.

source: There are three different tribes in Widelands: the Barbarians, the Empire and the Atlanteans. All tribes have a different economy, strength and weaknesses, but the general gameplay is the same for all. We will play the Barbarians for now.
target: In Widelands gifft 't veer Völker: de Willen Lüü, dat Latienske Riek, de Atlantinger un de Fresen. All Völker hebben eene annere Wirtschaft un hör Starkten un Swackten, aber in ’t Geheel is dat Speel för all gliek. Nu spölen wi de Wille Lüü.

source: In Widelands, it is necessary to build many buildings, which take up a lot of space. To expand your territory, you have to build military buildings next to your border. Every tribe has several military buildings.
target: In Widelands mutt du völe Husen bauen, de mennig Rüümte bruuken. Um dien Gewest to vergrotern mutt du immer Soldateree-Boen dicht bi de Grenz bauen. All Völker hebben enige Soldateree-Boen.

source: You should also keep in mind that each of the three tribes in Widelands has its own way of training, so the buildings and wares are different. Also, the ability levels cannot be compared: an Imperial soldier has a base attack of %1% at level 0, while a Barbarian soldier at the same level only has a base attack of %2%.
target: Vergeet nich, dat alle Völker in Widelands anners öven un annere Boen un Waren hebben. De Egenskuppen-Standen könen nich vergleken worden: Een Rieks-Soldat hett een Angriff vun %1% bei Stand 0, een Willer Soldat mit de sülvigen Stand blot %2%.

source: Great work, the citadel is finished. But what’s that? A hostile tribe has settled next to us while the citadel was under construction! Do you see how they took away a part of our land? And our lumberjack has now lost his place of work. This is what I was talking about. Let’s take our land back and defeat the enemy!
target: Hunnert, de Kasteel is beschickt. Aber wat is dat? Een Feind hett sük tegen uns daallaten as de Kasteel baut wurr! Süchst du, dat se eenen Part vun uns Land ofgrapst hebben? Un uns Boomhauer hett nu keen Huus mehr. Dat hebb ick meent. Laat uns uns Land torügghalen un de Feind manntjen!

source: You are now ready to play the campaigns. They will teach you about the different economies of the tribes. You can also play the remaining tutorials, but they are not crucial for succeeding in the campaigns.
target: Nu büst du klaar um Spölen vun de Rutfödderungs-Riegen. Se föhren di in de Wirtschaften vun de verschedenen Völkern in. Du kannst ok de annern Inföhrens spölen, aber du bruukst se nich unbedingt, um de Rutfödderungen to spölen.

source: The mighty tribes of the east-lands.
target: De furchtbaaren Lüü vun de Lannen im Oosten.

source: The tribe or team that can defeat all others wins the game!
target: De Speler oder Klottje dat kriggt all annern unner siegt!

source: Six months ago, Lutius – a young general of the Empire – was sent with 150 soldiers to the frontier beyond the northern forests where Barbarian tribes were crossing onto land held by the Empire. His task was to defend the Empire’s land. At first, everything was calm. He even talked to a few Barbarian children and thought about a peaceful life – side by side with this archaic folk. He began to feel safer and his army began to drop their attention off the potential enemy. That was their undoing. One night in March his unprepared army was attacked by 100 Barbarian footmen and was completely scattered. Only with his bare life he and a handful of his soldiers survived.
target: Vör sess Maanten wurr Lutjus – een junger Offizeer vum Latiensken Riek – mit 150 Soldaten an de Grenz achtern de noordelken Walden schickt, wo de Willen Lüü ins Land vum Riek indrungen. Siene Upgaav was, dat Land vum Riek to verdedigen. Eerst was alls friedelk. He snackde mit Willen Kinners un wullt in Freden leven – Sied an Sied mit de steenolle Volk. He meende, seker to wesen, un siene Soldaten achtden nich mehr up de mögelk Feinde. Dat was een Fehler. In eener Määrtnacht wurren siene unrüsten Soldaten vun 100 Willen Stahfasten angrepen un heel un dall verjaggt. He un een paar vun sienen Suldaten överleevden mit nix as de blote Leven.

source: The mighty tribes of the east-lands.
target: De furchtbaaren Lüü vun de Lannen im Oosten.

source: Your territory can be expanded by building various military buildings – Sentry, Fortress, Blockhouse, etc.
target: Du kannst dien Gewest groter maken, indeem du Soldateree-Boen baust – to 'n Bispööl Wachters-Kamern, Schanzen oder Toorns.

source: ‘2/4’ below your sentry: For military buildings, the stationed soldiers are shown instead of a productivity. You want to have four soldiers in your sentries, but only two soldiers are stationed in this kind of building. This leaves two vacant positions – we really need more soldiers.
target: »2/4« unner diener Wachters-Kamer: För Soldateree-Boen wiest dat Fenster de Tahl vun Soldaten un nich de Wöörde. Du willt veer Soldaten in dienen Wachters-Kamerken hebben, hest aber blot twee Soldaten in düssen Husen. 't gifft also twee lege Steden – wi bruken absolut mehr Soldaten.

source: By the Gods, this is an unbelievable stroke of fortune! There are two more mountains, and it seems that one has a large quantity of coal and the other of iron ore. I advise you to immediately build iron and coal mines (or at least charcoal kilns), smelting works, toolsmithies, armor and weapon smithies.
target: Bi de Gotten, wat för een unbannigs Glück! 't gifft noch twee annere Bargen, un ick glööv, de eene hett een Bült vun Köhle un de anner vun Iesenkluut. Ick raad Jo, stracks Iesen- un Köhle-Bargwarken (oder tominnst Holtköhl-Brannereen), Smeltwarken, Warktüügsmeden, Wapensmeden un Panzersmeden to bauen.

source: I advise to build all those buildings within a short distance of each other, and to construct two warehouses nearby: One should be set to store only weapons, armor, ores, metal and coal; the other to store building materials.
target: Ick raad an, dat all düsse Husen dicht binanner baut worden, un twee Kraamhusen in de Naberskupp: För eens sall fastleggt worden, dat 't nix as Wapen, Panzers, Kluten, Metallen un Köhle verwahrt; de anner sall Baumaterialien upbewahren.

source: We will need a tailor’s shop to sew more protective garments, and another sewing room to keep producing normal fur garments. Also, you should enhance the small armor smithy to produce better weapons and helmets, and build a new small one so we will still get basic weapons. We need at least one gold mine now, because the best weapons and armor use gold.
target: Wi bruken eene Sniederee, um betere Schuulkluften to naihen, un eene neie Naiheree, um noch normaale Fellkluften to kriegen. Un du sallst de Lütte Wapensmee utbauen, um betere Wapen un Helms to produzeren, un eene neie Lütte bauen, darmit wi noch eenfache Wapen kriegen. Wi bruken nu tominnst een Gold-Bargwark, wiel de besten Wapen un Panzers Gold bruken.

source: Breeds strong reindeer for adding them to the transportation system. Also keeps them for their fur, which is turned into armor and cloth.
target: Tüchtet stevige Sneeihirsken för dat Stratennett. Se worden ok för hör Fell tüchtet, wat man för Kluften un Stoff bruukt.

source: The other two important food wares are smoked fish and smoked meat. Raw meat is delivered from a hunter. A fisher gets the fish out of the sea while a fish breeder makes sure that a school of fish does not go extinct by breeding more. Make sure that there are always fish left, otherwise the fish breeder won’t be able to breed new ones. The smoking happens in a smokery, you will need at least two of those.
target: De annern twee wichtigen Spiesen sünd Rökelfiss un Rökelfleesk. Een Jäger levert rauhes Fleesk. Een Fisker hollt Fisse ut de See un een Fisstüchter kümmert sük daarum, dat de Fisse nich all fiskt worden, indeem he welke tüchtet. Pass up, dat immer een paar Fisse övrig sünd, anners kann de Fisstüchter keene mehr tüchten. Fiss un Fleesk worden in eener Rökelkamer rökelt, bau daar tominnst twee vun.

source: The first two tabs show you the production and consumption of any ware. You can toggle them by simply clicking on them.
target: De eersten twee Listenwessler wiesen, waar vööl vun elkeen Waar produzeert un verbruukt word. Du kannst se wiesen oder verbargen, indeem du se anklickst.

source: In this tab, you can see the difference between production and consumption, called ‘economy health’. You can see at one glance which one of those two is higher for the selected ware, that means whether the amount increases or decreases.
target: Düsse Listenwessler wiest de Ofstand tüsken dat, wat produzeert word, un dat, wat verbruukt word. Dat heet »Wirtschafts-Utglekenheid«. Du kannst stracks sehn, welkes vun beiden för de utköörte Waar hoger is, also of de Bestand verhoogt oder minnert word.

source: The third tab shows you the economy health of the ware. When the value is positive, this means your stock is growing.
target: De darde Listenwessler wiest de Wirtschafts-Utglekenheid för elkeen Waar. Wenn de Weert groter as null is, heet dat, dat de Bestand wasst.

source: The fisher working at this aqua farm can’t find any fish ponds in his work area. Please make sure there is a working clay pit nearby and the aqua farm is supplied with all needed wares, or consider dismantling or destroying this building.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi düsse Fissbuurderee hett keene Polen mehr. Bidde pass up dat eene Lehmkuhl in de Naberskupp arbeidt un de Fissbuurderee all's hett wat se tum Arbeiden bruukt. Oder überlegg di, of du dat Huus ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: The other two important food wares are smoked fish and smoked meat. Raw meat is delivered from a hunter. A fisher gets the fish out of the sea while a fish breeder makes sure that a school of fish does not go extinct by breeding more. Make sure that there are always fish left, otherwise the fish breeder won’t be able to breed new ones. The smoking happens in a smokery, you will need at least two of those.
target: De annern twee wichtigen Spiesen sünd Rökelfiss un Rökelfleesk. Een Jäger levert rauhes Fleesk. Een Fisker hollt Fisse ut de See un een Fisstüchter kümmert sük daarum, dat de Fisse nich all fiskt worden, indeem he welke tüchtet. Pass up, dat immer een paar Fisse övrig sünd, anners kann de Fisstüchter keene mehr tüchten. Fiss un Fleesk worden in eener Rökelkamer rökelt, bau daar tominnst twee vun.

source: The fisher working at this aqua farm can’t find any fish ponds in his work area. Please make sure there is a working clay pit nearby and the aqua farm is supplied with all needed wares, or consider dismantling or destroying this building.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi düsse Fissbuurderee hett keene Polen mehr. Bidde pass up dat eene Lehmkuhl in de Naberskupp arbeidt un de Fissbuurderee all's hett wat se tum Arbeiden bruukt. Oder überlegg di, of du dat Huus ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: By the Gods, this is an unbelievable stroke of fortune! There are two more mountains, and it seems that one has a large quantity of coal and the other of iron ore. I advise you to immediately build iron and coal mines (or at least charcoal kilns), smelting works, toolsmithies, armor and weapon smithies.
target: Bi de Gotten, wat för een unbannigs Glück! 't gifft noch twee annere Bargen, un ick glööv, de eene hett een Bült vun Köhle un de anner vun Iesenkluut. Ick raad Jo, stracks Iesen- un Köhle-Bargwarken (oder tominnst Holtköhl-Brannereen), Smeltwarken, Warktüügsmeden, Wapensmeden un Panzersmeden to bauen.

source: An example: the default value for scythes is 1. If you build a farm, a carrier will take a scythe and become a farmer. Then there will be no scythes left, but the target quantity is 1, therefore your toolsmith will start producing another one.
target: To 'n Bispööl is de End-Tahl för Sichten 1. Wenn du eene Buurderee baust, nimmt een Lastendrager eene Sichte un word een Buur. Dann sünd keene Sichten över, aber de End-Tahl is 1, also maakt diene Warktüügsmee eene neie.

source: Our ship is badly damaged and is taking in more and more water. We can thank the Gods if we survive this black night with our lives.
target: Uns Schipp is heel un dall in de Dutt un vull mit Lecks. Wi mutten de Gotten Loff un Dank seggen, wenn wi düsse swarte Nacht överleven.

source: Failed to host the server!
target: Kunn de Server nich berieten!

source: Produces beer of the lower grade. This beer is a vital component of the snacks that inns and big inns prepare for miners in deep mines.
target: Maakt jentigs Beer. Düsses Beer word för de Spiesen bruukt, de Weertskuppen un Weertshusen för Bargwarkskeerls in deepen Bargwarken torechtmaken.

source: Beer is produced in micro breweries and used in inns and big inns to produce snacks.
target: Beer word in Lütten Broereen produzeert un vun Krogen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Spiesen to produzeren.

source: Only this beer is acceptable for the soldiers in a battle arena. Some say that the whole power of the Barbarians lies in this ale. It helps to train the soldiers’ evade level from 0 to 1 to 2. Strong beer is also used in big inns to prepare meals.
target: Nix as düsses Beer is good genoog för Soldaten im Slachtenring. 't heet, all de Kracht vun de Willen Lüü kummt vun düssem Drank. 't helpt, de Utwieken-Stand vun Soldaetn vun 0 över 1 na 2 to verbetern. Deftigs Beer word ok in Weertshusen bruukt, um Mahltieden torechttomaken.

source: Beer is produced in micro breweries and used in inns and big inns to produce snacks.
target: Beer word in Lütten Broereen produzeert un vun Krogen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Spiesen to produzeren.

source: He told me about the blockhouse. Well, I don’t think we need more blockhouses – instead, we might concentrate on other things now.
target: He hett mi vun de Wachters-Kamerke vertellt. Nu, ick glööv nich, dat wi noch mehr Wachters-Kamerkes bruuken – wi könen uns nu um annere Dingen kümmern.

source: We should start by taking care of our wood production. Trees don’t seem to grow well on this island; better build at least two houses for foresters and one for a woodcutter.
target: Wi sallen mit uns' Holt-Versörgung anfangen. Bomen wassen woll nich good up de Hallig; bau bidde tominnst twee Husen för Försters un eens för eenen Boomslager.

source: You did well. Our entire building material production is working now. Let’s wait until we have gathered some more materials. We could expand our territory some more, to see what else can be found on this island.
target: Hunnert. Wi könen nu all de nödigen Baumaterialien produzeren. Laat uns wachten, bit wi enige Materialien sammelt hebben. Wi könen nu uns' Gewest vergrotern, um to sehn, wat 't noch up düsse Hallig gifft.

source: Build an iron mine and perhaps a gold mine. As they produce only ores, we will need a furnace to smelt them. Also build a blacksmithy to ensure we won’t run out of tools – and yes, a small armor smithy as well. It produces helmets as well as swords. I hope we won’t meet enemies here, but it’s better to be prepared.
target: Bau een Iesen-Bargwark un wenn mögelk een Gold-Bargwark. Se produzeren nix as Kluten, wi bruken also eene Smelteree, um se to smelten. Bau ok eene Smede, daarmit dat Warktüüg nich knapp word – och, un ok eene Lütte Wapensmee. Se produzeert Helms un Sweerten. Ick hoop, dat wi hier keene Feinde treffen, aber 't is beter, sük klaartomaken.

source: Our mines are working well. We can now produce all the tools we need, and some weapons as well.
target: Uns' Bargwarken arbeiden good. Wi könen nu all dat Warktüüg produzeren, wat wi bruken, un ok een paar Wapen.

source: Soldiers are trained in two steps in defense and health. They get fur garments studded with iron and also gold to cushion blows; and helmets forged from iron, and gold as well, to lengthen their life in battle.
target: Soldaten lehren Verteidigung un Gesundheid in twee Stappen. Se kriegen Fellkluften mit Iesen un ok Gold as Polsters för Slagen; un Helms, de ut Iesen un ok Gold smeedt worden, um hör Leven in de Slacht langer to maken.

source: Despair not, I did espy some hope! The easternmost tip of the island, as well as the space where the fiends’ headquarters stood, seems well suited to build a port on. If we manage to construct a ship, and fill it with all we need to build a new settlement, we may be able to escape.
target: Vertwiefel nich, ick hebb wat Hoop! De Oostspitz vun de Hallig on ok de Stee, waar dat Raadhuus vun de Feinden stunn, düchten mi gadelk, eene Muu to bauen. Wenn wi 't schaffen, een Schipp to bauen, un 't mit all de Waren füllen, de wi bruken, um een neies Dörp to gründen, könen wi villicht utrieten.

source: I wanted to teach you how to build new flags, but it seems you have already found out on your own. Well done!
target: Ick wull di lehren, wo dat Upstellen vun neien Fahnen gaht, aber du hest dat openbaar sülvst utfunnen. Hunnert!

source: The needed wares are also delivered there. For successful training, you need pitta bread and strong beer, as well as either fish or meat.
target: De nödigen Waren worden daar ok al hen transporteert. Daarmit dat Öven klappt, bruukst du Pitta-Brood un Deftigs Beer, un of Fiss of Fleesk.

source: Here in the northern part, you only have a goldmine and a warehouse. While the miners are supplied well with food, there is no way to transport the gold ore to our smelting works in the southern part.
target: Hier im Noorden hest du nix as een Gold-Bargwark un een Kraamhuus. De Bargwarkskeerls kriggen Spiesen satt, aber wi könen de Goldkluten nich to de Smeltwarken im Süden transporteren.

source: Welcome back. In this tutorial, I’ll tell you what you can do to check how well your economy works.
target: Wilkomen torügg. In düsse Inföhren vertell ick di, wat du doon kannst, um natokieken, wo good diene Wirtschaft löppt.

source: Building your economy up and making it work well and grow is the main part of Widelands. But you can’t control the workers directly – they will follow the general conditions you set.
target: Diene Wirtschaft uptobaun un daarför to sörgen, dat se good arbeidt un wasst, is dat Wichtigste, wat 't in Widelands gifft. Aber du kannst de Arbeiders nich stuuv instrueren – se hören up de Grundsatzen för de Wirtschaft, de du fastleggst.

source: You can find the full text of the license there as well as further information about its philosophy and the legal implications.
target: Da finnst du de kumpleten Text vun de Lizenz un anner Informatioonen över hör Philosophie un rechtliches Utwirken.

source: Connected to a computer player (the face in the picture as well as the mouse hover texts indicate the strength of the currently selected computer player).
target: Mit eenem künstelken Speler verbunnen (dat Gesicht in de Bill un de Text, de kummt, wenn du mit de Muus daarup wiest, geven de Starkde vun de utköört künstelken Speler an).

source: You can find general help for the editor as well as a short tutorial on our wiki at %s.
target: Du finnst allgemeene Hülp för de Bewarker un een körte Inföhren in uns Wiki unner %s.

source: Trains soldiers in Attack up to level 3 as well as in Defense and Health to level 1. Equips the soldiers with all necessary weapons and armor parts.
target: Lehrt Soldaten Angriff tum Stand 3 un in Verteidigung un Gesundheid tum Stand 1. Rüst de Soldaten mit all nödigen Wapen un Wapenrocken ut.

source: Please also include which operating system you are running Widelands on as some bugs can be platform specific.
target: Bidde segg ok, welkes Bedriev-Systeem du bruukst. Enige Fehler passeren nämlich blot up bestimmte Systemen.

source: By the Gods! One of our scouts has discovered a mighty castle at the center of the old plateau. The castle must be quite old and seems to have been built in a foreign style. It’s quite obvious that this is not barbarian craft.
target: Heer Gommes! Eener vun uns Bespejers hett een machtigs Slött in de Midde vun de Ollen Flackland funnen. Dat Slött mutt steenold wesen un is in butenlandsker Aard baut. Dat is wisse keene Wille Künst.

source: Six months ago, Lutius – a young general of the Empire – was sent with 150 soldiers to the frontier beyond the northern forests where Barbarian tribes were crossing onto land held by the Empire. His task was to defend the Empire’s land. At first, everything was calm. He even talked to a few Barbarian children and thought about a peaceful life – side by side with this archaic folk. He began to feel safer and his army began to drop their attention off the potential enemy. That was their undoing. One night in March his unprepared army was attacked by 100 Barbarian footmen and was completely scattered. Only with his bare life he and a handful of his soldiers survived.
target: Vör sess Maanten wurr Lutjus – een junger Offizeer vum Latiensken Riek – mit 150 Soldaten an de Grenz achtern de noordelken Walden schickt, wo de Willen Lüü ins Land vum Riek indrungen. Siene Upgaav was, dat Land vum Riek to verdedigen. Eerst was alls friedelk. He snackde mit Willen Kinners un wullt in Freden leven – Sied an Sied mit de steenolle Volk. He meende, seker to wesen, un siene Soldaten achtden nich mehr up de mögelk Feinde. Dat was een Fehler. In eener Määrtnacht wurren siene unrüsten Soldaten vun 100 Willen Stahfasten angrepen un heel un dall verjaggt. He un een paar vun sienen Suldaten överleevden mit nix as de blote Leven.

source: Another Barbarian – edited by king_of_nowhere
target: Another Barbarian – vun king_of_nowhere bewarkt

source: What has become of our Empire? I really ask this question – why did my king forbid me from fighting against that monstrous Barbarian tribe, who first acted as a peaceful friend and then attacked my army in the darkest night?
target: Wat is blot ut uns Latiensken Riek worden? Dat fraag ick würrelk – waarum hett min König mi unnerseggt, mit düssem verfuterten Willen Volk to fechten, dat sük eerst as Fründ upspöölt hett, um miene Soldaten dann um Middernacht antogriepen?

source: With an army of 150 men, I was assigned to patrol on our northern frontier, which lies near the Galdin Mountains in a great, beautiful and ancient forest. Soon, we met a Barbarian tribe, which at first was friendly. A few of my men even traded with them and their children came to us, to admire our clean and tidy uniforms and weapons.
target: Mit 150 Soldaten bün ick schickt worden, de Grenz im Noorden, wat in de Naberskupp vun de Galdin-Bargen in eenem groten, mojen, steenollen Wald liggt, unner Ogen to hollen. Wi hebben bold een Willes Volk truffen, wat toeerst liesaam was. Een paar vun mienen Lüü hebben mit för sogaar hannelt; hör Kinners sünd to uns komen un hebben uns püken, akkeraten Kluften un Wapens to bewunnern.

source: Destroy the Barbarian tribe
target: Verneel dat Wille Volk

source: Destroy the Barbarian Tribe
target: Verneel dat Wille Volk

source: Attack and completely destroy the Barbarian buildings as soon as you have enough soldiers.
target: Griep de Willen Husen an un verneel se kumpleet, sobald du genoog Soldaten hest.

source: Build a fortress on the peninsula (near where the Barbarian headquarters stood before). Finally, this will avoid new settlements of other tribes in that region.
target: Bau eene Schanz up de Uthamm (waar vördeem dat Wille Raadhuus stunn). Dann laten sük keene annern Völker in düsse Gegend daal.

source: Today, as I walked down to the eastern shore, I got a shock. I caught sight of one of those hated, evil, Barbarian tribes with whom we have had so many problems before.
target: As ick vörhen to de oostelken Küst gahn bün, hebb ick mi verschrickt. Ick hebb eenes vun düssen furchtbaren, öveln, Willen Völkern sehn, waar wi al so mennig Problemen mit harren.

source: There are still a few Barbarians hiding on our island, but I am sure that we will find them soon. Every Barbarian who doesn’t attack us will be put in a boat with the other peaceful ones, and sent back to their country.
target: 't gifft noch een paar Wille Lüü, de sük up uns Insel versteken, aber wiss finnen wi se bold. All Willen, de uns nich angriepen, setten wi in een Schipp mit de annern freedsamen un schicken se in hör Land torügg.

source: New soldiers are created differently from normal workers: recruits will walk from a warehouse (or your headquarters) to the barracks where they will receive some basic training and become soldiers. Basic Barbarian soldiers do not use armor, they only need an ax.
target: Neie Soldaten worden nich as annere Arbeiders anhüürt: Lehrwichter gahn vun eenem Kraamhuus (oder dienem Raadhuus) to eener Kasern, waar se de Grundlagen büffeln un Soldaten worden. Neie Soldaten vun de Willen Lüü bruuken keenen Wapenrock, blot eene Ext.

source: If a Barbarian soldier is fully trained, he has level %1% health, level %2% attack, level %3% defense and level %4% evade. This is one fearsome warrior then! The individual abilities have the following meaning:
target: Een allerbest utbildt Willer Soldat hett Gesundheid-Stand %1%, Angriff-Stand %2%, Verteidigung-Stand %3% un Utwieken-Stand %4%. Wat för een grieselker Soldat! De Egenskuppen bedüden:

source: The total life of a soldier. A Barbarian soldier starts with %1% health, and he will gain %2% health with each health level.
target: Dat Leven vun eenem Soldat. Een Willer Soldat hett anfangs %1% Gesundheid-Punkten un kriggt mit jedem Gesundheid-Stand %2% Punkten bito.

source: The amount of damage a soldier will inflict on the enemy when an attack is successful. A Barbarian soldier with attack level 0 inflicts ~%1% points of health damage when he succeeds in hitting an enemy. For each attack level, he gains %2% damage points.
target: De Schaa, wat een Soldat de feind dood, wenn een Angriff klappt. Een Willer Soldat mit Angriff-Stand 0 besehrt de Feind um ~%1% Gesundheid-Punkten, wenn he de Feind trefft. Mit jedem Angriff-Stand kriggt he %2% Schaa-Punkten bito.

source: The defense is the percentage that is subtracted from the attack value. The Barbarians cannot train in this skill and therefore have always defense level 0, which means that the damage is always reduced by %1%%%. If an attacker with an attack value of 3500 points hits a Barbarian soldier, the Barbarian will lose 3500·%2%%% = %3% health.
target: De Verteidigung is een Prozent-Tahl, wat vun eenem Angriff oftreckt word. Wille Lüü könen düsse Egenskupp nich verbetern un hebben also immer Verteidigung-Stand 0, de Schaa word also immer um %1%%% minnert. Wenn een Angrieper mit eenem Angriff-Weert vun 3500 eenen Willen Soldat trefft, verlüst de Wille 3500·%2%%% = %3% Gesundheid-Punkten.

source: Evade is the chance that the soldier is able to dodge an attack. A level 0 Barbarian has a %1%%% chance to evade an attack, and this increases in steps of %2%%% for each level.
target: Utwieken is de Kans, dat een Soldat eenem Angriff ut de Mööt gaht. Een Willer Soldat mit Stand 0 hett eene Kans vun %1%%%, eenem Angriff uttowieken, un düsse Kans wörd mit jedem Utwieken-Stand um %2%%% beter.

source: There is a second training site: the training camp. It is a big building too, and to complement the battle arena, it trains attack and health (remember, the Barbarian soldiers cannot be trained in defense).
target: 't gifft noch eenen annern Övens-Boo: dat Övens-Lager. Ok dat is een grotes Huus, un 't deit tum Slachtenring bi, indeem 't Angriff un Gesundheid lehrt (vergeet nich, de Willen Soldaten könen keene Verteidigung lehren).

source: This equipment is produced in smithies out of coal, iron, and sometimes gold. You will learn more about this in the second scenario of the Barbarian campaign.
target: Düsse Dingen worden in Smeden ut Köhle, Iesen un bi einigen ok Gold smeedt. De tweede Wille-Lüü-Rutfödderung lehrt di mehr daaröver.

source: You should also keep in mind that each of the three tribes in Widelands has its own way of training, so the buildings and wares are different. Also, the ability levels cannot be compared: an Imperial soldier has a base attack of %1% at level 0, while a Barbarian soldier at the same level only has a base attack of %2%.
target: Vergeet nich, dat alle Völker in Widelands anners öven un annere Boen un Waren hebben. De Egenskuppen-Standen könen nich vergleken worden: Een Rieks-Soldat hett een Angriff vun %1% bei Stand 0, een Willer Soldat mit de sülvigen Stand blot %2%.

source:
An old Barbarian proverb
meaning that you need to take some risks sometimes.
target:
Eene olle Wille Seggwies,
wat bedüddt, dat du mennigmaal een Raakwark doon muttst.

source: The Barbarian ax workshop is the intermediate production site in a series of three buildings. It is enhanced from the metal workshop but doesn’t require additional qualification for the worker.
target: De Wille Extensmede is dat middelste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen. Eene Metalldreihbank word daarto utbaut, aber de Arbeider bruukt daar keene Erfahrung för.

source: The Barbarian metal workshop is the basic production site in a series of three buildings and creates all the tools that Barbarians need. The others are for weapons.
target: De Wille Metalldreihbank is dat eerste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen un produzeert all dat Warktüüg, dat de Willen Lüü bruken. De annern sünd för Wapens.

source: Cultivates reed that serves two different purposes for the Barbarian tribe.
target: Kultiveert Reit, wat de Willen Lüü för twee Dingen bruken.

source: The Barbarian war mill is their most advanced production site for weapons. As such you will need to enhance an ax workshop in order to get one.
target: De Wille Oorlogs-Smee is dat grootste Huus för Wapen. Du mutt eene Extensmede utbauen, um se to kriegen.

source: The warrior’s ax is the most dangerous of all Barbarian weapons. Only a few soldiers ever were able to handle this huge and powerful ax. It is produced in a war mill and used – together with food – in a training camp to train soldiers from attack level 4 to level 5.
target: De Ridderext is de machtigste Wapen vun allen, de de Willen Lüü hebben. Bedröövt minn Soldaten könen düsse grote, baldadige Ext bruken. 't word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert un – tosammen mit Spiese – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 4 up Stand 5 to verbetern.

source: After losing an important battle against the barbarians which lead to the loss of a big part of the Empire’s territory, Lutius leaves Fremil to start a new life. But his destiny takes his ship into a heavy storm, which nearly destroys it. Only with a lot of luck he manages to beach his damaged ship on an unknown desert strand and save his people. For now.
target: Nadeem he eene wichtige Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü un eenen groten Part vun de Land vun de Latiensken Riek verloren hett, verlett Lutjus Freemilt un begünnt een neies Leven. Aber sien Schipp word vun de Slag in eenen Kohstörm föhrt un haast verneelt. Nix as Glück vergünnt hüm, mit de ramponeerten Schipp up eenen frömden Strand uptolopen un siene Lüü to redden. Vöreerst.

source: Three weeks later, I returned to Fremil to speak with our king. He was furious at the Barbarians, yet forbade any attack on these tribes. He believed that our army was too weak to survive in a war against the Barbarians.
target: Dree Weken naher was ick torügg in Freemilt, um mit de König to spreken. He was güünsk över de Willen Lüü, versee mir aber, düsse Völker antogriepen. He meende, uns Soldateree is to swack, düsse Willen Lüü im Krieg to manntjen.

source: Still, I saw no way that I could erase my shame without fighting against these Barbarians. So, I left Fremil by boat to find a new world and a new life for myself, somewhere in the south. Now I am sailing on the Gulf of Perl with my family, some of my friends and a few of my best warriors.
target: Ick wuss nich, wo ick mien Schann ohne eene Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü liekmaken kann. Also hebb ick Freemilt up eenem Schipp verlaten, um eene neie Heimaad un een neies Leven to finnen, enerwaar im Süden. Upstünds seil ick in de Parrelsbucht mit mien Familie, enigen Frünnen un een paar vun mienen besten Soldaten.

source: You have established a working economy, trained new soldiers and driven the Barbarians from the island.
target: Du hest eene gode Wirtschaft baut, neie Soldaten utstaffeert un de Willen Lüü vun de Insel verdreven.

source: The message was addressed to me, begging me to come back to Fremil. It says that the Empire is at war with the Barbarians. They were attacked from the north by the tribe that I was forbidden to attack. It is clear to me what I must do…
target: 't was eene Naricht för mi, de mi daarum anging, dat ick na Freemilt torügg koom. Dat Latienske Riek is im Krieg mit de Willen Lüü. Se sünd vun Noorden angrepen worden, vun de Volk, wat ick nich angriepen dürde. Ick weet, wat ick doon mutt…

source: Send a ship northwards to gather some intelligence about the Barbarians. Try to build a port on the island and found an outpost.
target: Stüür een Schipp na Noorden, um wat över de Willen Lüü ruttofinnen. Versöök, eene Muu up de Insel to bauen un eene Butenstee uptosetten.

source: Let’s finish the Barbarians off and provide a nice colony to the caesar of our empire.
target: Laat uns de Willen Lüü schieren un wi könen de Kaiser vun uns' Riek eene moje Provinz geven.

source: Expanding is as simple as building a military building at the edge of your territory. The Barbarians have a selection of different military buildings: sentries, barriers, towers, fortresses and citadels. The bigger the building, the more expensive it is to build, but the more land it will conquer around itself and the more soldiers can be stationed there. The buildings also vary in their vision range: buildings with a tower see farther than others.
target: Vergrotern is ganz licht: Du baust een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz vun dien Gewest. De Willen Lüü hebben verschedene Soldateree-Boen: Wachters-Kamers, Uppassen, Toorns, Schanzen un Kastelen. So groter de Boo is, so dürer is 't, aber 't nimmt mehr Land in un kann mehr Soldaten upnehmen. De Boen hebben unglieke Utsichtswiedten: Boen mit Toorns sehn wieder as anners.

source: The Barbarians have four different military buildings you can build: the sentry (small), the barrier and the tower (both medium) and the fortress (big). Just choose the one you like most.
target: De Willen Lüü hebben veer Soldateree-Boen, wat du bauen kannst: De Wachters-Kamer (lütt), de Uppass un de Toorn (beide middelmatig) un de Schanz (grot). Köör dat ut, wat du am meesten magst.

source: The initial setting depends on the type of the building. For the Barbarians, the sentry is the only building that prefers rookies by default. You should change this setting to fit your current needs.
target: De normaale Instellung hangt vun de Huus-Aard of. De Willen Lüü hebben blot een Boo, de Wachters-Kamer, wat normaal Snöttbaarten vörtreckt. Du sallst düsse Instellung ännern, as 't upstünds good is.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: Dat Kasteel hett Steden för 12 Soldaten un is de grootste Soldateree-Boo, wat de Willen Lüü bauen könen. 't köst mennig Materialien un dat Bauen düürt lang. 't is good gadelk, um taktisk dürable Steden as enge Passen oder Bargen to schütten.

source: The Barbarian metal workshop is the basic production site in a series of three buildings and creates all the tools that Barbarians need. The others are for weapons.
target: De Wille Metalldreihbank is dat eerste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen un produzeert all dat Warktüüg, dat de Willen Lüü bruken. De annern sünd för Wapens.

source: Produces all the axes that the Barbarians use for warfare.
target: Produzeert all Exten, de de Willen Lüü för Slachten bruken.

source: The ax is the basic weapon of the Barbarians. All young soldiers are equipped with it.
target: De Ext is de eenfachste Wapen för de Willen Lüü. Alle neien Soldaten kriegen eene.

source: This is a dangerous weapon the Barbarians are able to produce. It is produced in the war mill. Only trained soldiers are able to wield such a weapon. It is used – together with food – in the training camp to train soldiers from attack level 3 to 4.
target: Dat is eene priekelne Wapen, wat de Willen Lüü produzeren könen! 't word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert. Blot bannig gode Soldaten könen sülk eene Wapen bruken. 't word – tosammen mit Spiesen – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 3 up 4 to verbetern.

source: Only this beer is acceptable for the soldiers in a battle arena. Some say that the whole power of the Barbarians lies in this ale. It helps to train the soldiers’ evade level from 0 to 1 to 2. Strong beer is also used in big inns to prepare meals.
target: Nix as düsses Beer is good genoog för Soldaten im Slachtenring. 't heet, all de Kracht vun de Willen Lüü kummt vun düssem Drank. 't helpt, de Utwieken-Stand vun Soldaetn vun 0 över 1 na 2 to verbetern. Deftigs Beer word ok in Weertshusen bruukt, um Mahltieden torechttomaken.

source: In the last tab, you can also see your absolute stock. It will increase when the economy health is positive, and decrease otherwise. Compare the two graphs!
target: De leste Listenwessler wiest de Bestand all tosammen. Wenn de Wirtschafts-Utglekenheit groter as null is, word he groter, anners lütter. Vergliek de beiden Berichten!

source: An example: the default value for scythes is 1. If you build a farm, a carrier will take a scythe and become a farmer. Then there will be no scythes left, but the target quantity is 1, therefore your toolsmith will start producing another one.
target: To 'n Bispööl is de End-Tahl för Sichten 1. Wenn du eene Buurderee baust, nimmt een Lastendrager eene Sichte un word een Buur. Dann sünd keene Sichten över, aber de End-Tahl is 1, also maakt diene Warktüügsmee eene neie.

source: I noticed that the construction of the sawmill is complete, so we can begin to refine the logs that the lumberjacks are harvesting into planks.
target: De Saagmöhlen is beschickt, wi könen nu Planken ut de de Boomstammen vun de Boomhauers maken.

source: The blackroot farmer needs %1% on average to sow and harvest a bundle of blackroot.
target: De Swartwuddel-Buur bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Bünsel Swartwuddels to saien un to arnten.

source: The farmer needs %1% on average to sow and harvest a sheaf of corn.
target: De Buur bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Bünsel Mais to saien un to arnten.

source: The farmer needs %1% on average to sow and harvest a sheaf of wheat.
target: De Buur bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Bünsel Weit to saien un to arnten.

source: The baker needs %1% on average to bake a loaf of bread.
target: De Backer bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Brood to backen.

source: The brewer needs %1% on average to brew a vat of beer.
target: De Broer bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Fatt Beer to broen.

source: The farmer needs %1% on average to sow and harvest a sheaf of wheat.
target: De Buur bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Bünsel Weit to saien un to arnten.

source: The innkeeper needs %1% on average to prepare a ration and a meal. If the economy doesn’t need both, the innkeeper needs %2% on average to prepare one ration or one meal.
target: De Weert bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Happ un een Mahl torechttomaken. Wenn de Wirtschaft nich beide bruukt, bruukt de Weert dör de Bank %2% um een Happ oder een Mahl torechttomaken.

source: The miller needs %1% on average to grind wheat into a sack of flour.
target: De Müller bruukt dör de Bank %1% um Weit för eenen Sack Mehl to mahlen.

source: The pig breeder needs %1% on average to raise and slaughter a pig.
target: De Swientjentüchter bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Swientje to föden un to slachten.

source: The innkeeper needs %1% on average to prepare a ration.
target: De Weert bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Happ torechttomaken.

source: To do so, place a flag up on the mountain’s flank to the east (on mountain terrain though, not mountain meadow). When you click on the new flag, you can send geologists there. Because the flag is on a mountain, the geologists will search for ores; otherwise, they would search for water. Then build a mine for both kinds of resources that they will find, choosing the appropriate mine to be built:
target: Daarto mutt du eene Fahn up de Sied vun de Barg im Oosten upstellen (up eener Barg-Landskupp, nich eener Bargmede). Wenn du de neie Fahn anklickst, kannst du daar Schattsökers henschicken. Wenn de Fahn up eenem Barg is, söcht de Schattsöker na Mineraalen, anners Water. Bau dann een Bargwark för elkeen vun de beiden Mineraale, wat se finnen. Um de rechte Aard vun Bargwark uttokören:

source: A normal mine can only dig up about one third of all the resources that lie beneath it; then it must be enhanced to a deep mine in order to keep it working properly. To enhance a building, choose it and then click the appropriate button in the appearing window.
target: Een normaales Bargwark kann blot een Dardel vun all Mineraale daarunner ofboen; dann mutt 't to eenem Deepen Bargwark utbaut worden, daarmit 't wieder arbeiden kann. Um een Huus uttobauen, klick 't an un klick dann de »Utbauen«-Knoop im Huus-Fenster an.

source: In order to call a geologist to search for water, click on a flag in the area that you want him to search and then on the button labeled ‘Send geologist to explore site’.
target: Daarmit een Schattsöker Water söcht, klick eene Fahn an, de in de Kuntrei staht, waar he söken sall, un klick dann de Knoop »Enn Schattsöker sall düsse Stee unnersöken« an.

source: Remember that you can access the economy settings by clicking on any flag.
target: Du kannst de Wirtschafts-Instellungen openmaken, indeem du elkeen Fahn anklickst.

source: First, I’ll left-click on the symbol where I want the lumberjack’s hut to be built. A window will appear where I can choose between buildings. Because I’ll click a yellow house symbol – which means that its field can house medium and small buildings – I am presented with all the medium buildings that I can build. The lumberjack’s hut is a small building, so I will go on to select the small buildings tab. Then I’ll choose the lumberjack’s hut.
target: Toeerst klick ick de Teken, waar dat Boomhauer-Huus entstahn sall, mit de linke Muustaste an. Een Fenster kummt vundag, waar ick tüsken mehren Husen kören kann. Ick klicke een geles Huus-Teken an – dat heet, daar kann man lütte un middelmatige Husen bauen – daarum worden all de middelmatig Husen, de ick bauen kann, anzeigt. Dat Boomhauer-Huus is een lüttes Huus, daarum klick ick de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen an. Dann köör ick dat Boomhauer-Huus ut.

source: Click the ‘OK’ button to watch me. I’ll go really slowly: I will click – then select the tab – and finally I’ll choose the building.
target: Klick de »Jau«-Knoop an, um mi totokieken. Ick maak 't ganz langsaam: Ick klick – dann köör ick de Listenwessler ut – ennelk köör ick dat Huus.

source: You try it this time: click on the yellow flag symbol in between the two blue flags we just placed and then click on the
target: Nu versöchst du 't: Klick dat gele Fahnen-Teken tüsken de twee blauen Fahnen, de wi even upstellt hebben, an, un klick dann dat

source: If you click on the construction site, a window will open. You can see the wares that are still missing grayed out. You can also see the progress of this construction site.
target: Wenn du de Baustee anklickst, deit sük een Fenster open. De Waren, de noch hapern, sehn grau ut. Du süchst ok, wo vööl vun de Baustee al beschickt is.

source: Very good. And now about the minimap. You can open it by clicking on the
target: Hunnert. Un nu de Lütte Kaart. Du kannst se openkriegen, indeem du de

source: Try it out. Open the minimap, click on a few buttons and try moving around. Close it when you have experimented enough.
target: Versöök 't. Maak de Lütt Kaart open, klick een paar Knopen an un versöök, de Sicht to bewegen. Maak 't to, wenn du genoog probeert hest.

source: Make sure that you are showing the building spaces, then just click on the space were you want the building to be, choose it from the window that appears, and it is placed. Maybe this is a good time to explain about all those building space symbols we activated earlier.
target: Pass up, dat de Rüümte tum Bauen to sehn sünd, dann klick de Stee an, waar de dat Huus hebben willt, köör 't ut in de Fenster, wat vundag kummt, un alls is klaar. Villicht is 't nu up rechte Tied, all düsse »Rüümte tum Bauen«-Tekens, de wi vörhen sehn hebben, to verklaren.

source: Now go ahead, try it. The quarry is a small building, so if you click on a medium or big building symbol, you will have to select the small buildings tab first to find it. Go on, check it out!
target: Nu versöök 't. Dat Flintslagerhuus is een lüttes Huus; wenn du up een Teken för middelmatig oder grote Husen klickst, mutt du eerst de Listenwessler för lütte Husen utkören, um 't to finnen. Probeer 't!

source: Just click on any house symbol next to the rocks, select the small buildings tab in the window that opens up, then click on the quarry symbol.
target: Klick eenfach een of anner Huus-Teken tegen de Stenen an, köör de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut un klick dann de Flintslagerhuus-Teken an.

source: If you decide you do not want to build a road at this time, you can cancel road building by clicking on the starting flag of the road and selecting
target: Wenn du jüüst doch keene Straat bauen willt, kannst du dat Stratenbauen ofbreken, indeem du up de Anfangs-Fahn klickst un

source: If you decide that you do not want to build a road at this time, you can cancel road building by clicking on the starting flag of the road and selecting
target: Wenn du jüüst doch keene Straat bauen willt, kannst du dat Stratenbauen ofbreken, indeem du up de Anfangs-Fahn klickst un

source: To build a completely new road, just click on the flag in front of your construction site, click on the build road icon and then click on the flag in front of your headquarters. Wait for the completion of the quarry.
target: Um eene neie Straat to bauen, klick de Fahn vör diener Baustee an, klick dat »Straten bauen«-Teken an un klick dann de Fahn vör dienem Raadhuus an. Wacht bit dat Flintslagerhuus kumpleet is.

source: Your workers do not like to walk across country. You have to build a road from your headquarters to the construction site so that carriers can transport wares. The simplest way is to click on the construction site’s flag, choose ‘Build road’, and then click on the destination flag (the one in front of your headquarters), just like I’ve demonstrated.
target: Diene Arbeiders lopen nich geern över de Meedjes. Du mutt eene Straat vun dienem Raadhuus tur Baustee bauen, daarmit de Lastendragers Waren transporteren könen. Dat is ganz licht: Klick de Fahn vör de Baustee an, köör »Straten bauen« ut, un klick de Ennfahn (vör dienem Raadhuus) an, as ick di vörmaakt hebb.

source: You have two messages at the moment. This one, which you are currently reading, and the one that informed you that a new headquarters was added to your economy. Let’s learn how to archive messages: first, select the message that you wish to archive by clicking on it in the list. Then, click the
target: Du hest even twee Narichten. Düsse hier, wat du upstünds leest, un eene, wat di över een neies Raadhuus in diener Wirtschaft informeert. Laat mi di lehren, wo dat Wegdoon vun Narichten gaht: Toeerst köörst du de Naricht, wat du wegdoon willt, ut, indeem du se in de Liste anklickst. Dann klick de

source: To do so, open the message window by pressing ‘n’ or clicking the second button from the right at the very bottom of the screen. The newest message will be marked for you automatically. Keep clicking the ‘Archive selected message’ button until all messages have been archived and the list is empty.
target: Daarto maakst du dat Narichtenfenster up, indeem du »N« oder de tweeden Knoop vun rechts an de unnern Rand vum Bildschirm drückst. De neeiste Naricht word automatisk utköört. Klick solang de »Düsse Naricht wegdoon«-Knoop an, bit alle Narichten wegdaan sünd un de Liste leeg is.

source: To leave this game and return to the main menu, click on the
target: Um dat Speel to verlaten un tum Höövdmenü torüggtogahn, klick de

source: ‘Main Menu’ button on the very left at the bottom of the screen. Then click the
target: »Höövdmenü«-Knoop ganz links an de unnern Rand vum Bildschirm an. Klick dann de

source: There is another way how you can control the strength of a military building: by the number of soldiers stationed there. Just click on the arrow buttons to decrease or increase the desired number of soldiers. Every building has a maximum capacity. In case of the barrier, it is five, for example.
target: Du kannst de Foss vun eenem Soldateree-Boo ok anners fastsetten: indeem du de Tahl vun Soldaten, de hier wohnen, ännerst. Klick de Piel-Knopen an, um de wiskt Tahl to verhogen oder minnern. Jede Boo hett eene höchste Tahl vun Steden. To 'n Bispööl hett een Uppass fiev.

source: If you wish to send a certain soldier away, you can simply click on it. It will then be replaced by another soldier.
target: Wenn du eenen wissen Soldat wegstüren willt, klick hüm an. He word dann mit eenem annern Soldat utwesselt.

source: Citadels can’t be built directly. Instead, you’ll have to construct a fortress first and then enhance it to a citadel. To do so, click on the fortress, then choose the ‘Enhance to Citadel’ button.
target: Kastelen könen nich direkt baut worden. Du mutt toeerst eene Schanz bauen, dann kannst du se to een Kasteel utbauen. Um dat to doon, klick de Schanz an un köör de »To Kasteel utbauen«-Knoop ut.

source: To attack a building, click on its doors, choose the number of soldiers that you wish to send and click on the ‘Attack’ button.
target: Um een Huus antogriepen, klick siene Döör an, köör de Tahl vun Soldaten, wat de schicken willt, ut, un klick dann de »Angriepen«-Knoop an.

source: Additionally, ports offer the possibility of transporting wares via ships. When you click on the port you already have, you will notice two additional tabs: ‘Wares waiting to be shipped’ and ‘workers waiting to embark.’ They are waiting for a ship to transport them to another port. Currently, there are none because we have not yet built a second port. So let’s change this!
target: Muden maaken 't aber ok mögelk, Waren mit Schippen to transporteren. Klick eene Muu, de du al hest, an, un du süchst twee neie Listenwesslers: »Waren de up een Schipp wachten« un »Arbeiders de up een Schipp wachten«. Se wachten up een Schipp, wat se to eener annern Muu brengen sall. Upstünds wachtet nix, wiel wi blot eene Muu hebben. Laat uns noch eene bauen!

source: Ports are built like normal buildings, but are only available on blue port spaces. Just click on a field with the icon and the building menu automatically offers you to build a port.
target: Muden baust du as annere Husen, aber se sünd blot up de blauen Rüümten för Muden paraat. Klick een Feld mit de Teken an un dat Bau-Menü büddt di eene Muu an.

source: When you click on the expedition ship, a window opens where you can control your ship.
target: Wenn du dat Schipp up Söke anklickst, süchst du een Fenster mit wat du dat Schipp stüren kannst.

source: If you click on a building, you can scroll through the buildings of the selected type.
target: Klick up een Huus un du kannst tüsken all Husen vun de utköörte Aard jumpen.

source: Now have a look at these two tabs. When you click on the
target: Kiek di düsse twee Listenwesslers nu an. Wenn du de

source: When you click on the red dot (low priority), the corresponding ware gets delivered less frequently. Green means that as many wares as possible should be delivered to this building, maybe because it produces something important.
target: Wenn du de roden Knoop utköörst, word de Waar seltener levert. De gröne Knoop maakt, dat so völe Waren as mögelk to düsse Huus transporteert worden sallen, to 'n Bispööl wiel 't wat wichtiges produzeert.

source: I’ll continue as soon as you click on the
target: Ick maak wieder, wenn du de

source: The first two tabs show you the production and consumption of any ware. You can toggle them by simply clicking on them.
target: De eersten twee Listenwessler wiesen, waar vööl vun elkeen Waar produzeert un verbruukt word. Du kannst se wiesen oder verbargen, indeem du se anklickst.

source: The window can be accessed by clicking on any flag you own.
target: Du kannst düsses Fenster vun elkeen vun dienen Fahnen opmaken.

source: To do so, click on any flag and choose ‘Configure economy’. In this menu window, you can decide how many wares of each type you wish to have in stock.
target: Daarto klickst du elkeen Fahn an un bruukst de Knoop »Wirtschafts-Instellungen«. In düssem Fenster kannst du fastleggen, wo völe Waren vun elkeen Aard du in Kraamhusen hebben willt.

source: You can select multiple animal types if you hold down Ctrl during selection. If you then click on the map, an instance of one of the selected animal types will be placed.
target: Du kannst mehr Aarden vun Deerten utkören, indeem du bi'm Utkören Strg drückst. Wenn du dann de Kaart anklickst, wird eens vun de utköörten Deerten sett.

source: Use the priority buttons in building windows to adjust delivery of a specific ware. Pressing Ctrl while clicking will adjust all wares at once.
target: Bruuk de Wichtigkeids-Knopen in eenem Huus-Fenster, um de Versörgung mit eener wissen Ware fasttoleggen. Drück daarbi de Strg-Tast, um 't för all Waren up eenmaal fasttosetten.

source: If you like to live dangerously, pressing Ctrl while clicking the enhance, dismantle or destroy building buttons will skip the confirmation.
target: 't is gefahrelk, aber wenn de Strg-Tast drückt hollen, as du de Knopen för 't Utbauen, Plattrieten oder Ofbrannen vun eenem Huus bruukst, word de Sekerheids-Fraag weglaten.

source: Click on the map to increase, Shift + Click on the map to decrease terrain height
target: Klicke de Kaart tum Verhogen an; drücke daar de Umschalt-Tast bi tum lütter maken.

source: Ctrl + Click on the map to set terrain height
target: Klicke de Kaart an un drücke daar de Strg-Tast bi tum Fastsetten vun de Höchte.

source: Click on the map to increase, Shift + Click on the map to decrease the amount of the selected resource
target: Klicke de Kaart tum Verhogen, oder drücke daar de Umschalt-Tast bi tum lütter maken, vun de Mass vun de utköört Mineraal.

source: Ctrl + Click on the map to set the amount of the selected resource. This will replace already set resources.
target: Klicke de Kaart tum an un drücke daar de Strg-Tast bi tum Fastsetten vun de Mass vun de utköört Mineraal. Daar wesen Mineraale warrn utwesselt.

source: Press any key or click to continue…
target: Drück elkeen Tast oder klick tum Wiedermaken…

source: Show idle ships
target: Lege Schippen wiesen

source: Show idle ships
target: Lege Schippen wiesen

source: Finally! We have just taken our first step towards victory! Last night, we landed on the forbidden island and defeated the few guards that were watching the north-western part of the island. I am quite sure that none of the other warlords has detected us so far, so we should keep quiet and build up our infrastructure. Soon we will be strong enough to raid their positions.
target: Uplest! Wi hebben jüüst de eersten Stapp tum Sieg daan! Leste Nacht sünd wi up de verbodenen Insel lannt un hebben de minnen Wachten im Noordwest vun de Insel manntjet. Ick bün mi seker, dat keen Kummandant uns al funnen hett, wi sallen nu also ruhig blieven un eene Wirtschaft upbauen. Bold sünd wi stark genoog, hör Stellungen intonehmen.

source: Wonderful! Our troops have finally defeated Lanissa and her soldiers. The ancient castle is ours!
target: Hunnert! Uns Soldateree hett Laniss' un hör Soldaten ennelk manntjet. Dat steenolle Slött hört to uns!

source: Finally, we were set towards Fremil again. I couldn’t await the chance to clear my records of this big defeat by the Barbarians.
target: Ennelk fuhren wi weer na Freemilt. Ick kunn nich ofwachten, dat Rorüggdenken an miene grote Nederlaag tegen de Willen Lüü to dilgen.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the castle.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Slött manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the castle.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Slött manntjet.
